<script setup>

</script>

<template>
  <input v-model="newTaskDescription" placeholder="Enter a description"/>
  <button @click="addTask">Add Task (enter description)</button>

</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from "vue";

const newTaskDescription = ref("");
</script>

<script>
import api from "@/services/api";

export default {
  name: 'AddTask',
  data() {
    return {
      tasks: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async addTask() {
      // if (!this.newTaskDescription.trim()) {
      //   return;
      // }

      try {
        const response = await api.addTask({ description: this.newTaskDescription });
        this.tasks.push(response.data || response);
        this.newTaskDescription = "";
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de la t√¢che :', error);
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
